thread.section_title: Cookiebouquets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cookiebouquets | cookiebouquets.com | 3 of 16
thread.title: BUYER BEWARE

author: BUYER BEWARE
title: BUYER BEWARE
text: Huge disappointment. The picture showed they came in a vase they were in a cardboard box. Cookies tasted old and flavorless. My fiance who I bought this for said he was scared he would break a tooth on the cookies they were that hard and dry. It broke my heart, this was his Valentines gift. A complete waste of 80.00 .. We threw the entire thing away after one day. BUYER BEWARE!
